meanings.definition: Estimate (a quantity, value, or extent) without precise information; guess.
meanings.sent1: I was guesstimating the number of candies in the jar.
meanings.sent2: She is guesstimating the cost of the project.
meanings.sent3: While guesstimating the weight of the suitcase, I accidentally included my shoes.
meanings.sent4: He was guesstimating the time it would take to finish the race, but he ended up being faster than expected.
meanings.sent5: Guesstimating the distance to the moon is like trying to count the stars in the sky.

meanings.definition: An estimate based on a mixture of guesswork and calculation.
meanings.sent1: Her guesstimate of the crowd size was surprisingly accurate.
meanings.sent2: The financial report included a guesstimate of future expenses.
meanings.sent3: The guesstimate of how many cookies to bake for the party was way off.
meanings.sent4: The guesstimate of the storm's arrival time helped people prepare in advance.
meanings.sent5: Making a guesstimate about the winner of the game is always exciting.
